com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.adapters

Class EndlessAdapterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.adapters.EndlessAdapterWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener, android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class EndlessAdapterWrapper
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    A wrapper for another adapter. This is a merge of the CommonsWare's AdapterWrapper and EndlessAdapter libraries of which neither support CursorAdapters.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener

        SCROLL_STATE_FLING, SCROLL_STATE_IDLE, SCROLL_STATE_TOUCH_SCROLL

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

    • Method Detail

      • loadData

        public abstract void loadData()
        Override this method to perform the actual data loading. startDataLoading will be called for you automatically, and finishedDataLoading will be called when the child adapter's data changes. This method should not be called directly, instead call startDataLoading, which will check if we are already sent a request to load more data and update the listview. If after trying to load more data, no additional data was found, manually call finishedDataLoading.

      • startDataLoading

        public void startDataLoading()
        Shows the pending view signalling more data is being loaded. Calling this when data is already being loaded will have no effect. When manually loading data, be sure to call this.

      • finishedDataLoading

        public void finishedDataLoading()
        Hides the pending view signalling no data is being loaded. Call this if a load finished but there was no additional data to display.

      • setParentAdatper

        public void setParentAdatper(android.widget.BaseAdapter parent)

      • setPendingResource

        public void setPendingResource(int pendingResource)
        Sets the view to display when more data is being loaded.
        Parameters:
        pendingResource - Layout to be used for the pending row
